titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 9) to amend the Voting Rights Act of 1965.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 109-516, by Mr. Diaz-Balart, L..

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 9 with 1 hour and 30 minutes of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit with or without instructions. Measure will be considered read. Specified amendments are in order.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 199.

action.text: Pursuant to the provisions of H. Res. 890, H. Res. 878 is laid on the table.

bill.summary: 6/20/2006--Reported to House without amendment. Sets forth the rule for consideration of H.R. 9 (Fannie Lou Hamer, Rosa Parks, and Coretta Scott King Voting Rights Act Reauthorization and Amendments Act of 2006).
